metadata.title: RHSA-2024:0217: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 (rabbitmq-server) security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
RabbitMQ is an implementation of AMQP, the emerging standard for high performance enterprise messaging. The RabbitMQ server is a robust and scalable implementation of an AMQP broker.

Security Fix(es):

* rabbitmq-server: DoS by publishing large messages over the HTTP API (CVE-2023-46118)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: rabbitmq-server: DoS by publishing large messages over the HTTP API

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
rabbitmq-server is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
